Package uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.config

Provides general configuration utility classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KConfigClassFinder<T>
    Responsible for finding classes of a specific type, located within a specific set of packages, lying somewhere on the class-path.
    KConfigClassLoader
    Responsible for loading specific named classes.
    KConfigFile
    Represents a MEKON configuration file, which is an XML format file containing configuration information both for the core MEKON system, or for any model section-builder plugins that wish to make use of it.
    KConfigNode
    Represents a node in a MEKON configuration file (see KConfigFile).
    KConfigObjectConstructor<T>
    Responsible for constructing objects of a specific type.
    KConfigParameters
    Represents a list of parameters for a particular method, including both the expected parameter-types, and the actual parameter values.
    KConfigResourceFinder
    Responsible for finding resources (files or directories) with paths specified relative either to a specific base-directory or to some location on the class-path.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    KSystemConfigException
    Exception thrown when some problem is detected involving the locating or loading of system resources.

Package uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.config Description

Provides general configuration utility classes.
